title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.213 - Net worth
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.213 - Net worth

State Regulations

The aggregate presentation on the accounting records of
the equities representing proprietary interests; the excess of the going
concern's value of assets over liabilities to outsiders; of a corporation, the
total of paid-in capital, retained earnings, and appropriated surplus; of a
sole proprietorship, the proprietor's account; of a partnership, the sum of the
partners' accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.213

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
